verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <WH8199> sha-fe-Te-ni Judge יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- in אֲ֭נִי <WH589> 'A-ni my בְּתֻמִּ֣י <WH8537> be-tum-Mi in mine integrity הָלַ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> ha-Lach-ti; for I have walked וּבַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh also in the LORD בָּ֝טַ֗חְתִּי <WH982> ba-Tach-ti, I have trusted לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo without אֶמְעָֽד׃ <WH4571> 'em-'Ad. [therefore] I shall not slide

בְּחָנֵ֣נִי <WH974> be-cha-Ne-ni Examine יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD וְנַסֵּ֑נִי <WH5254> ve-nas-Se-ni; and prove; צְרֹופָה tze-ro-fah כצָרְפָ֖ה <WH6884> tza-re-Fah cast קכִלְיוֹתַ֣י <WH3629> chil-yo-Tai my reins וְלִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> ve-lib-Bi. and my heart

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> Chas-de-cha For thy lovingkindness לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> le-Ne-ged about עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai; [is] before mine eyes וְ֝הִתְהַלַּ֗כְתִּי <WH1980> ve-hit-hal-Lach-ti, and I have walked בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> ba-'a-mit-Te-cha. in thy truth

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יָ֭שַׁבְתִּי <WH3427> Ya-shav-ti I have not sat עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with מְתֵי־ <WH4962> me-tei- persons שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> Shav; with vain וְעִ֥ם <WH5973> ve-'Im with נַ֝עֲלָמִ֗ים <WH5956> na-'a-la-Mim, with dissemblers לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor אָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> a-Vo. neither will I go in

שָׂ֭נֵאתִי <WH8130> ne-ti I have hated קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> ke-Hal the congregation מְרֵעִ֑ים <WH7489> me-re-'Im; of evil doers וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- with רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, with the wicked לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo and I will not אֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> 'e-Shev. and will not sit

אֶרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> 'er-Chatz I will wash בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <WH5356> be-nik-ka-Yon in innocency כַּפָּ֑י <WH3709> kap-Pai; mine hands וַאֲסֹבְבָ֖ה <WH5437> va-'a-soe-Vah so will I compass אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ <WH4196> miz-ba-cha-Cha thine altar יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. O LORD

לַ֭שְׁמִעַ <WH8085> Lash-mi-a' That I may publish בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol with the voice תּוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> to-Dah; of thanksgiving וּ֝לְסַפֵּ֗ר <WH5608> u-le-sap-Per, and tell כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha. of all thy wondrous works

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD אָ֭הַבְתִּי <WH157> 'A-hav-ti I have loved מְע֣וֹן <WH4583> me-'on the habitation בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> bei-Te-cha; of thy house וּ֝מְק֗וֹם <WH4725> u-me-Kom, and the place מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> mish-Kan dwelleth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> ke-vo-De-cha. where thine honour

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- Nor תֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <WH622> te-'e-Sof Gather עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with חַטָּאִ֣ים <WH2400> chat-ta-'Im with sinners נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; not my soul וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- with אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> 'an-Shei men דָמִ֣ים <WH1818> da-Mim with bloody חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> chai-Yai. nor my life

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whose בִּידֵיהֶ֥ם <WH3027> bi-dei-Hem In whose hands זִמָּ֑ה <WH2154> zim-Mah; [is] mischief וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <WH3225> vi-mi-Nam, and their right hand מָ֣לְאָה <WH4390> Mal-'ah is full שֹּֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> Sho-chad. of bribes

וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> Va-'a-ni my בְּתֻמִּ֥י <WH8537> be-tum-Mi in mine integrity אֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech, shall walk פְּדֵ֣נִי <WH6299> pe-De-ni redeem וְחָנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2603> ve-chon-Ne-ni me and be merciful

רַ֭גְלִי <WH7272> Rag-li My foot עָֽמְדָ֣ה <WH5975> 'a-me-Dah standeth בְמִישׁ֑וֹר <WH4334> ve-mi-Shor; in an even place בְּ֝מַקְהֵלִ֗ים <WH4721> be-mak-he-Lim, in the congregations אֲבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> 'a-va-Rech will I bless יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD
